title: Glimpses of Gandhiji = Glimpses of Ghandhi
brief_description: A survey of the life or Mahatma Ghandhiji. Recalls his childhood; student life in England; the launching of the Satyagraha Campaign in South Africa and subsequently in India; and his martyrdom in January 1948 when a whole nation was plunged into mourning.
